name: Kozmoll Dark Lady
effectText: (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 Level 6 or higher "Kozmo" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Kozmoll Dark Lady" once per turn. Once per turn, when another monster's effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster.
